item.title: The second annual 30-day map challenge is starting November 1: https://www.gislounge.com/november-map-challenge/. Each day presents a new map challenge and cartographers are invited to create a map each day with the tools of their choice centered around that day‚Äôs theme and share it on social media using the #30DayMapChallenge hashtag. #OpenStreetMap

An extensive #tutorial on how to draw buildings quickly in #JOSM: https://www.openstreetmap.org/user/IpswichMapper/diary/394485. Maybe too quickly, if you judge by the comments to the post. Anyway, the article is full of #tips and techniques to better use JOSM. #openStreetMap

‚ÄúOpenStreetMap find‚Äù is a simple command line #CLI tool to explore #OpenStreetMap data: github.com/codesoap/osmf (MIT License). The tool short name ‚Äúosmf‚Äù can unfortunately be confused with ‚ÄúOpenStreetMap Foundation‚Äù, but that‚Äôs a minor issue probably.

Would there be ways to convince La Ligue Cardiologique Belge / De Belgische Cardiologische Liga to release their #AED data and use #OpenStreetMap as base map in their app ? https://www.liguecardioliga.be/reanim/
#OpenStreetMap #Belgium‚Äôs Mapper of the Month #MotM is Thierry Hancart in the spotlight: https://openstreetmap.be/en/motm/2020/10/15/thierry-hancart.html
I never thought I‚Äôd count üíØüíØ 200 hundred followers when I joined Mastodon two years ago... Thanks for your interest! Fediverse is a great place.

#BuDongSan is a #OpenStreetMap-based realtor tycoon game (BuDongSan is the Korean word for real estate). Notice it‚Äôs still in prototype phase. - https://mrvdh.github.com/budongsan - https://github.com/MRVDH/budongsan #FOSS #realestate #game
#OpenStreetMap Salt Lake City has a series of #Meetup events coming with @mvexel: https://www.meetup.com/OpenStreetMap-Utah/. Being online events, you can join from anywhere.
‚ÄúChronicles of mapping a Canadian village‚Äù in #OpenStreetMap: https://www.openstreetmap.org/user/Creator13/diary/394298. If you like to map towns, this article is a good read.
Detailed instructions to contribute pictures with #GoPro Max 360¬∞ camera to #Mapillary: https://help.mapillary.com/hc/en-us/articles/360012674619-GoPro-MAX #OpenStreetMap
Really basic online #quizz and #poll app but free of charge and privacy respectful: https://www.onlinequestions.org and https://onlineclicker.org.
A friendly introduction to the #Fediverse: https://drwho.virtadpt.net/page/a-friendly-introduction-to-the-fediverse

Nice effort to #3D model the Trilogy of #Athens in #OpenStreetMap: - 3D view: https://demo.f4map.com/#lat=37.9808081&lon=23.7337054&zoom=18&camera.phi=4.872 - Article: https://www.reddit.com/r/openstreetmap/comments/iwlezz/i_3d_mapped_the_trilogy_of_athens/ #f4map
#OpenStreetMap Mapper of the Month #MotM is back with an article presenting Jacques Fondaire from #Belgium: https://openstreetmap.be/en/motm/2020/09/16/jacques-fondaire.html
The Best Privacy-Friendly Alternatives to Google Maps: https://www.wired.co.uk/article/google-maps-alternatives-privacy. Of course, #OpenStreetMap is listed.

‚ÄúLights of the sea online Lights of the sea online‚Äù is an #OpenStreetMap-based interactive map full of blinking #lighthouses, light buoys and other beacons to discover and explore: http://beacons.schmirler.de/en/index.html

Training developers in writing secure code is not easy. What do you think of the Security Knowledge Framework ? https://www.securityknowledgeframework.org SKF is a fully open-source Python-Flask web-application that uses the OWASP Application Security Verification Standard to train you and your team in writing secure code, by design. #SKF #SecDevOps #OWAP #ASVS

#FOSDEM 2021 will take place on Saturday 6 and Sunday 7 February 2021 as an online event: https://fosdem.org/2021/news/2020-09-01-dates-fosdem-2021/. FOSDEM is the two-day event organised by volunteers to promote the widespread use of #free and open source software #FOSS, taking place in the city of #Brussels, #Belgium. #FOSDEM21

@openstreetmap Just noticed there are 575 EUR worth yearly donation to #OpenStreetMap unclaimed on #Liberapay: - https://liberapay.com/on/twitter/openstreetmap - https://liberapay.com/on/github/openstreetmap Would be good to claim it, no?

Did you know #OSMF has arranged for a #BigBlueButton server for the #OpenStreetMap community to use for your local community meetings, etc. Details: https://wiki.osmfoundation.org/wiki/Tools/bigbluebutton
